Publish a trained model as a pin

publish_model.Rd

Uploads model artifacts as a versioned files pin.

Usage

publish_model(model_dir, name, board = pg_board(), metadata = list(), include_metrics = TRUE)

Arguments

model_dir

Directory containing model\_final.pth and config.yaml.

name

Pin name to publish under.

board

Pins board to publish to; defaults to pg_board().

metadata

Optional named list to store as pin metadata.

include_metrics

Whether to include metrics.json if present.

Value

Pin metadata list as returned by pins::pin_meta().

On this page
